name: Flip Words HD
description:
Click letters to make words and solve thousands of familiar phrases in one of the best selling and most addictive words games ever. Choose your favorite visual theme and music track as you solve challenging phrases from a wide variety of interesting categories. Use the exciting Word Boost to make the largest words possible and the valuable Phrase Boost to reveal letters that are in the hidden phrase.

* Click on letters to make words and solve phrases
* Purchase Boosts to make larger words and reveal letters in the hidden phrase
* Thousands of unique and fun phrases are included
* Automatically download new phrases for free
* Enjoy a variety of stimulating visual themes and music tracks
